about_the_game:
The Deluxe Edition of Different Strokes is made for players with impeccable taste, true connoisseurs of the finer things in life.
We've curated nothing but the most delectable additions to the gallery for you to enjoy, such as:

  • An expanded selection of pigments for your painting pleasure (16 colors vs 7 in base game)
  • A smaller brush size
  • Brush smoothing options
  • Unfettered access to The Studio: a space just for you where you can view all of your own paintings and all of the paintings you have liked, and paint upon a draft canvas that allows you to save a painting and work on it later before submitting it.
  • A new hairpiece for a certain, *ahem*, follically challenged staff member

If you consider yourself a true artist or patron of the arts, hesitate not — the gallery awaits!
Happy painting!

The Deluxe Edition of Different Strokes is made for players with impeccable taste, true connoisseurs of the finer things in life.
We've curated nothing but the most delectable additions to the gallery for you to enjoy, such as:

  • A smaller brush size
  • Brush smoothing options
  • Unfettered access to The Studio: a space just for you where you can view all of your own paintings and all of the paintings you have liked, and paint upon a draft canvas that allows you to save a painting and work on it later before submitting it.
  • A new hairpiece for a certain, *ahem*, follically challenged staff member

If you consider yourself a true artist or patron of the arts, hesitate not — the gallery awaits!
Happy painting!
name: Different Strokes Deluxe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
